# Regular Expression

```
^ : start of string
$ : end of string
{N} : N times
{N,} : at least N
{N, M} : N to M times
[A-Z] : range A to Z
[0-9] : range 0 to 9
[0-9A-Za-z] : Any
[xy] : x or y
[^xy] : except x and y
x+ : one or more x's
x* : zero or more x'Ds
x? : possibly exist
x|y : x or y exists
. : any character
```

```
\^ : ^
\d : digit
\D : non digit
\s : space
\S : non space
\t : tab
\w : word (alphabet, numbers, _)
\w : non word
```
